activities.name: execute proc
activities.description: this activity excutes a proc and that proc will load data from one table to another

properties.description: this dataflow extracts data from the source and transforms data with filter and loads that data destination table

scriptLines: select1 derive(Description = case(UnitPrice<100, 'UnitPrice is less than 100','UnitPrice is equal or greater than 100')) ~> derivedColumn1
select1 derive(Description = case(UnitPrice<100, 'UnitPrice is less than 100','UnitPrice is equal or greater than 100')) ~> derivedColumn1
